titleStmt.title: Correspondence from the Director of Personnel to the Director of the Colonies, March 4, 1864

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Correspondence from the Director of Personnel to the Director of the Colonies

div1.fw: Ministère de la Marine et des Colonies
NOTA. Les réponses doivent être adressées au Ministre et porter en marge l'indication ci-dessus.
div1.p: J'ai l'honneur de transmettre ci-joint à Monsieur le Directeur des Colonies comme rentrant par son objet dans ses attributions une lettre du Ministre des Affaires Etrangers relative à une demande d'exequatur formée par la Légation des Etats unis à Paris en faveur de M. Henry May que le Gouvernement de l'union vient de nommer agent commercial au Gabon.

div1.fw: Minister of the Navy and the Colonies
NOTE. The responses must be addressed to the Minister and put in the above indication in the margin.
div1.p: I have the honor of transmitting the enclosed to the Director of the Colonies as a substitute by his object in his attributions a letter from the Minister of Foreign Affairs relative to a demand of authorization by the Legation of the United States in Paris in favor of Mr. Henry May that the Government of the Union has just named Commercial Agent in Gabon.
